description:
Enotria: The Last Song, a Soulslike game inspired by Italian folklore, is set to release on 17th September for PS5 and PC. However, Xbox players will have to wait – perhaps indefinitely – due to platform submission issues and what the developer claims is a lack of support from Microsoft. Jacky Greco, CEO of Jyamma... Read more »

The post Xbox backlash grows as developer claims ‘they don’t care’ appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Xbox backlash grows as developer claims ‘they don’t care’
